text: Verlet may refer to: * Alice Verlet (1873–1934), Belgian-born operatic coloratura soprano * Blandine Verlet (1942–2018), French harpsichordist * Loup Verlet (born 1931), French physicist * Raoul Verlet (1857–1923), French sculptor * Verlet integration, a technique for computer simulation of molecular dynamics developed by Loup Verlet * Verlet list, a data structure useful in computer simulations of systems of particles
title: Verlet
